subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which of the following battles took place during the Battle of Haldighati?
question_hi: बहुत के बारेमोन में हल्दीगढ़ी के बाराइट का कौन-सा हुआ?
explanation_en: The Battle of Haldighati was fought between Rao Jodhaji of Mewar and Mughal Emperor Akbar.
explanation_hi: रावणी के राजा Rao Jodhaji और मुगल मेंड़ेंगे एक मोजघाटी के बाराइट हुआ मेंट
explanation_en: The Battle of Haldighati was fought between Rao Jodhaji of Mewar and Mughal Emperor Akbar.
explanation_hi: रावणी के राजा Rao Jodhaji aur मुगल मेंड़ेंगे एक मोजघाटी के बाराइट हुआ मेंट
